typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{First Name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Start Date} as string,
		{Last Login Time} as string,
		Salary as string,
		{Bonus %} as string,
		{Senior Management} as string,
		Team as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['*']) ~> source1
source1 derive(O_FNAME = initCap(trim({First Name})),
		O_GENDER = iif(trim(Gender) == 'Male','M','F'),
		O_SRMGMT = iif(upper(trim({Senior Management})) == 'TRUE', 'Y','N'),
		O_BONUS = trim({Bonus %},'%')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		GENDER as string,
		SALARY as decimal(18,0),
		SENIOR_MANAEMENT as string,
		TEAM as string,
		BONUS as decimal(18,0)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		FIRST_NAME = O_FNAME,
		GENDER = O_GENDER,
		SALARY = Salary,
		SENIOR_MANAEMENT = O_SRMGMT,
		TEAM = Team,
		BONUS = O_BONUS
	)) ~> sink1
